casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Bobby E. BOWDEN. No. 514P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 21, 2008. Katherine Jane Allen, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Bowden. Edward W. Grannis, Jr., District Attorney, for State. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 668 S.E.2d 107 .

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of November 2008 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of November 2008."
